title: Samin Nosrat
itunes:title: Samin Nosrat
itunes:subtitle: Samin Nosrat [Salt Fat Acid Heat, New York Times Magazine] talks with Anna about her first job in a restaurant, not always fitting in, her career as a chef, a writer, and TV host, and how food can make someone happy. Samin also gives Anna tips on how to p
description:
On behalf of the Unqualified community we are donating proceeds from this and upcoming episodes to the following:

Justice for Breonna Taylor
Justice for David McAtee
The Okra Project

If you would like to show your support you can follow the links above.

MACY’S Visit macys.com/unqualified where you can not only find all your summer fashion needs, but also access handpicked items by Anna which have been put on a special discount for unqualified listeners only!
ALLBIRDS With the new Allbirds Tree Dasher, feel confident knowing that you can run hard and tread light on the planet. Find your pair at Allbirds.com today.
MAGIC SPOON Go to magicspoon.com/ANNA to grab a variety pack and try it today! And be sure to use our promo code ANNA at checkout to get free shipping. And Magic Spoon is so confident in their product, it’s backed with a 100% happiness guarantee — so if you don’t like it for any reason, they'll refund your money, no questions asked. 
SAKARA Right now, Sakara is offering our listeners 20% off their order when they go to Sakara.com/UNQUALIFIED or enter code UNQUALIFIED at checkout to get 20% off your order.

Please subscribe to Anna Faris is Unqualified on Apple Podcasts and follow us on social media:

Instagram @Unqualified
Twitter @Unqualified
Facebook @Anna Faris is Unqualified
Music by: Mondo Cozmo @mondocozmo
Producer: Michael Barrett
Co-producer: Michael Sherman
Co-producer: Cassie Daniels @mscassiedaniels
Production Services: Rabbit Grin Productions rabbitgrinproductions.com
Distributed by: Simplecast


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
